context: how can you use a xbox360 controller can you give a step by step intruction
response: this is not a 360 controller, but you can load it with xbox360ce and it will work in games that need a 360 pad... however only the pro version stays resident otherwise you have to copy the files in each game that needs it.

context: Can you play retro NES, SNES and N64 games with this?
response: No it cant play them. Only plays DS, DSi, and 3DS games. But some games have been rereleased as a game for DS. Example the classic sonic the hedgehog games got released as "sonic classics" a DS tittle. "Namco museum DS" is another good DS game, it rereleases old arcade games like "galega" and " Pac-Man".

context: does it work with steam games?
response: Yes, it has worked with every Steam game that I've tried.  I have not had trouble getting any pre-XInput games to work, even older DOS games that use DOSBox.  What I *have* had trouble with is getting non-XInput controllers to work with newer games, but never the other way around.

context: How durable is this headset? I want one that can last me a few years.
